_header: Thou that in heaven for our salvation
Title(s): ‘Ane orisoun quhen the governour past into France’
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Ane orisoun quhen the governour past into France’ — five eight-line stanzas with refrain, ‘For but thy helpe this kynrick is forlorne’

CULLl510.First Lines:
Thow þat in heawin for oure saluatiounmaid Iustice mercie
                    & pietie to aggree…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…fra cair to confort thow mak restitutiounfor but thy help thy
                    kinrik is forlorne

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Thow þat in hewin for our saluatiounmaid Iustice mercie and
                    pietie to aggre…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…ffra cair to confort þow mak restitioun [sic]ffor
                    but thy help this kinrik is forlorne
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Author: Quod dunbar quhen the gouernour past in fraunce (p. 187)
